info.title: GitLab API
info.description:
An OpenAPI definition for the GitLab REST API.
Few API resources or endpoints are currently included.
The intent is to expand this to match the entire Markdown documentation of the API:
<https://docs.gitlab.com/ee/api/>. Contributions are welcome.

When viewing this on gitlab.com, you can test API calls directly from the browser
against the `gitlab.com` instance, if you are logged in.
The feature uses the current [GitLab session cookie](https://docs.gitlab.com/ee/api/#session-cookie),
so each request is made using your account.

Instructions for using this tool can be found in [Interactive API Documentation](https://docs.gitlab.com/ee/api/openapi/openapi_interactive.html)

tags.description: Operations related to linting a CI config file

tags.description: Operations to manage dependency proxy for a groups

tags.name: dora_metrics
tags.description: Operations related to DevOps Research and Assessment (DORA) key metrics

tags.description: Operations related to error tracking client keys

tags.description: Operations related to accessing GitLab feature flag user lists

tags.name: terraform_registry
tags.description: Operations related to the Terraform module registry

parameters.name: archived
parameters.description: Limit by archived status.

parameters.name: id_after
parameters.description: Limit results to projects with IDs greater than the specified ID.

parameters.name: id_before
parameters.description: Limit results to projects with IDs less than the specified ID.

parameters.name: membership
parameters.description: Limit by projects that the current user is a member of.

parameters.name: min_access_level
parameters.description: Limit by current user minimal access level.

parameters.name: order_by
parameters.description: Return projects ordered by id, name, path, created_at, updated_at, or last_activity_at fields. Default is created_at.

parameters.name: owned
parameters.description: Limit by projects explicitly owned by the current user.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Return list of projects matching the search criteria.

parameters.name: simple
parameters.description: Return only limited fields for each project. This is a no-op without authentication as then only simple fields are returned.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Return projects sorted in asc or desc order. Default is desc.

parameters.name: starred
parameters.description: Limit by projects starred by the current user.

parameters.name: statistics
parameters.description: Include project statistics.

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: The ID or username of the user.

parameters.name: visibility
parameters.description: Limit by visibility public, internal, or private.

parameters.name: with_custom_attributes
parameters.description: Include custom attributes in response. (admins only)

parameters.description: Limit by enabled issues feature.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project.

allow_merge_on_skipped_pipeline.description: Set whether or not merge requests can be merged with skipped jobs.

approvals_before_merge.description: How many approvers should approve merge request by default.

auto_cancel_pending_pipelines.description: Auto-cancel pending pipelines. This isn’t a boolean, but enabled/disabled.

auto_devops_deploy_strategy.description: Auto Deploy strategy (continuous, manual, or timed_incremental).

auto_devops_enabled.description: Enable Auto DevOps for this project.

autoclose_referenced_issues.description: Set whether auto-closing referenced issues on default branch.

avatar.description: Image file for avatar of the project.

build_git_strategy.description: The Git strategy. Defaults to fetch.

build_timeout.description: The maximum amount of time in minutes that a job is able run (in seconds).

builds_access_level.description: One of disabled, private, or enabled.

ci_config_path.description: The path to CI configuration file.

ci_default_git_depth.description: Default number of revisions for shallow cloning.

ci_forward_deployment_enabled.description: When a new deployment job starts, skip older deployment jobs that are still pending

container_expiration_policy_attributes.description: Update the image cleanup policy for this project. Accepts: cadence (string), keep_n (string), older_than (string), name_regex (string), name_regex_delete (string), name_regex_keep (string), enabled (boolean).

container_registry_enabled.description: Enable container registry for this project.

external_authorization_classification_la.description: The classification label for the project.

forking_access_level.description: One of disabled, private, or enabled.

issues_access_level.description: One of disabled, private, or enabled.

issues_enabled.description: (Deprecated) Enable issues for this project. Use issues_access_level instead.

jobs_enabled.description: (Deprecated) Enable jobs for this project. Use builds_access_level instead.

merge_requests_access_level.description: One of disabled, private, or enabled.

merge_requests_enabled.description: (Deprecated) Enable merge requests for this project. Use merge_requests_access_level instead.

mirror_user_id.description: User responsible for all the activity surrounding a pull mirror event. (admins only)

mirror.description: Enables pull mirroring in a project.

only_allow_merge_if_all_discussions_are_.description: Set whether merge requests can only be merged when all the discussions are resolved.

only_allow_merge_if_pipeline_succeeds.description: Set whether merge requests can only be merged with successful jobs.

packages_enabled.description: Enable or disable packages repository feature.

pages_access_level.description: One of disabled, private, enabled, or public.

requirements_access_level.description: One of disabled, private, enabled or public

path.description: Custom repository name for the project. By default generated based on name.

public_builds.description: If true, jobs can be viewed by non-project members.

remove_source_branch_after_merge.description: Enable Delete source branch option by default for all new merge requests.

repository_access_level.description: One of disabled, private, or enabled.

repository_storage.description: Which storage shard the repository is on. (admins only)

request_access_enabled.description: Allow users to request member access.

resolve_outdated_diff_discussions.description: Automatically resolve merge request diffs discussions on lines changed with a push.

service_desk_enabled.description: Enable or disable Service Desk feature.

shared_runners_enabled.description: Enable shared runners for this project.

snippets_access_level.description: One of disabled, private, or enabled.

snippets_enabled.description: (Deprecated) Enable snippets for this project. Use snippets_access_level instead.

suggestion_commit_message.description: The commit message used to apply merge request suggestions.

tag_list.description: The list of tags for a project; put array of tags, that should be finally assigned to a project.

wiki_access_level.description: One of disabled, private, or enabled.

wiki_enabled.description: (Deprecated) Enable wiki for this project. Use wiki_access_level instead.

parameters.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search for specific users.

parameters.name: skip_users
parameters.description: Filter out users with the specified IDs.

allow_merge_on_skipped_pipeline.description: Set whether or not merge requests can be merged with skipped jobs.

approvals_before_merge.description: How many approvers should approve merge requests by default.

auto_cancel_pending_pipelines.description: Auto-cancel pending pipelines. This isn’t a boolean, but enabled/disabled.

auto_devops_deploy_strategy.description: Auto Deploy strategy (continuous, manual or timed_incremental).

auto_devops_enabled.description: Enable Auto DevOps for this project.

autoclose_referenced_issues.description: Set whether auto-closing referenced issues on default branch.

avatar.description: Image file for avatar of the project.

build_git_strategy.description: The Git strategy. Defaults to fetch.

build_timeout.description: The maximum amount of time in minutes that a job is able run (in seconds).

builds_access_level.description: One of disabled, private, or enabled.

ci_config_path.description: The path to CI configuration file.

container_expiration_policy_attributes.description: Update the image cleanup policy for this project. Accepts: cadence (string), keep_n (string), older_than (string), name_regex (string), name_regex_delete (string), name_regex_keep (string), enabled (boolean).

container_registry_enabled.description: Enable container registry for this project.

external_authorization_classification_la.description: The classification label for the project.

forking_access_level.description: One of disabled, private, or enabled.

group_with_project_templates_id.description: For group-level custom templates, specifies ID of group from which all the custom project templates are sourced. Leave empty for instance-level templates. Requires use_custom_template to be true.

issues_access_level.description: One of disabled, private, or enabled.

issues_enabled.description: (Deprecated) Enable issues for this project. Use issues_access_level instead.

jobs_enabled.description: (Deprecated) Enable jobs for this project. Use builds_access_level instead.

merge_requests_access_level.description: One of disabled, private, or enabled.

merge_requests_enabled.description: (Deprecated) Enable merge requests for this project. Use merge_requests_access_level instead.

mirror.description: Enables pull mirroring in a project.

namespace_id.description: Namespace for the new project (defaults to the current user’s namespace).

only_allow_merge_if_all_discussions_are_.description: Set whether merge requests can only be merged when all the discussions are resolved.

only_allow_merge_if_pipeline_succeeds.description: Set whether merge requests can only be merged with successful jobs.

packages_enabled.description: Enable or disable packages repository feature.

pages_access_level.description: One of disabled, private, enabled, or public.

requirements_access_level.description: One of disabled, private, enabled or public

path.description: Repository name for new project. Generated based on name if not provided (generated as lowercase with dashes).

printing_merge_request_link_enabled.description: Show link to create/view merge request when pushing from the command line.

public_builds.description: If true, jobs can be viewed by non-project members.

remove_source_branch_after_merge.description: Enable Delete source branch option by default for all new merge requests.

repository_access_level.description: One of disabled, private, or enabled.

repository_storage.description: Which storage shard the repository is on. (admins only)

request_access_enabled.description: Allow users to request member access.

resolve_outdated_diff_discussions.description: Automatically resolve merge request diffs discussions on lines changed with a push.

shared_runners_enabled.description: Enable shared runners for this project.

snippets_access_level.description: One of disabled, private, or enabled.

snippets_enabled.description: (Deprecated) Enable snippets for this project. Use snippets_access_level instead.

tag_list.description: The list of tags for a project; put array of tags, that should be finally assigned to a project.

template_name.description: When used without use_custom_template, name of a built-in project template. When used with use_custom_template, name of a custom project template.

template_project_id.description: When used with use_custom_template, project ID of a custom project template. This is preferable to using template_name since template_name may be ambiguous.

use_custom_template.description: Use either custom instance or group (with group_with_project_templates_id) project template.

wiki_access_level.description: One of disabled, private, or enabled.

wiki_enabled.description: (Deprecated) Enable wiki for this project. Use wiki_access_level instead.

parameters.name: archived
parameters.description: Limit by archived status.

parameters.name: id_after
parameters.description: Limit results to projects with IDs greater than the specified ID.

parameters.name: id_before
parameters.description: Limit results to projects with IDs less than the specified ID.

parameters.name: last_activity_after
parameters.description: Limit results to projects with last_activity after specified time. Format: ISO 8601 YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ

parameters.name: last_activity_before
parameters.description: Limit results to projects with last_activity before specified time. Format: ISO 8601 YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ

parameters.name: membership
parameters.description: Limit by projects that the current user is a member of.

parameters.name: min_access_level
parameters.description: Limit by current user minimal access level.

parameters.name: order_by
parameters.description: Return projects ordered by id, name, path, created_at, updated_at, or last_activity_at fields. repository_size, storage_size, packages_size or wiki_size fields are only allowed for admins. Default is created_at.

parameters.name: owned
parameters.description: Limit by projects explicitly owned by the current user.

parameters.name: repository_checksum_failed
parameters.description: Limit projects where the repository checksum calculation has failed (Introduced in GitLab Premium 11.2).

parameters.name: repository_storage
parameters.description: Limit results to projects stored on repository_storage. (admins only)

parameters.name: search_namespaces
parameters.description: Include ancestor namespaces when matching search criteria. Default is false.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Return list of projects matching the search criteria.

parameters.name: simple
parameters.description: Return only limited fields for each project. This is a no-op without authentication as then only simple fields are returned.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Return projects sorted in asc or desc order. Default is desc.

parameters.name: starred
parameters.description: Limit by projects starred by the current user.

parameters.name: statistics
parameters.description: Include project statistics.

parameters.name: visibility
parameters.description: Limit by visibility public, internal, or private.

parameters.name: wiki_checksum_failed
parameters.description: Limit projects where the wiki checksum calculation has failed (Introduced in GitLab Premium 11.2).

parameters.name: with_custom_attributes
parameters.description: Include custom attributes in response. (admins only)

parameters.name: with_issues_enabled
parameters.description: Limit by enabled issues feature.

parameters.name: with_merge_requests_enabled
parameters.description: Limit by enabled merge requests feature.

parameters.name: with_programming_language
parameters.description: Limit by projects which use the given programming language.

parameters.name: skip_groups
parameters.description: Skip the group IDs passed

parameters.name: all_available
parameters.description: Show all the groups you have access to (defaults to false for authenticated users, true for admin); Attributes owned and min_access_level have precedence

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Return the list of authorized groups matching the search criteria

parameters.name: order_by
parameters.description: Order groups by name, path or id. Default is name

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Order groups in asc or desc order. Default is asc

parameters.name: statistics
parameters.description: Include group statistics (admins only)

parameters.name: with_custom_attributes
parameters.description: Include custom attributes in response (admins only)

parameters.name: owned
parameters.description: Limit to groups explicitly owned by the current user

parameters.name: min_access_level
parameters.description: Limit to groups where current user has at least this access level

membership_lock.description: Prevent adding new members to project membership within this group.

visibility.description: The group’s visibility. Can be private, internal, or public.

share_with_group_lock.description: Prevent sharing a project with another group within this group.

require_two_factor_authentication.description: Require all users in this group to setup Two-factor authentication.

two_factor_grace_period.description: Time before Two-factor authentication is enforced (in hours).

project_creation_level.description: Determine if developers can create projects in the group. Can be noone (No one), maintainer (Maintainers), or developer (Developers + Maintainers).

auto_devops_enabled.description: Default to Auto DevOps pipeline for all projects within this group.

subgroup_creation_level.description: Allowed to create subgroups. Can be owner (Owners), or maintainer (Maintainers).

avatar.description: Image file for avatar of the group. Introduced in GitLab 12.9

mentions_disabled.description: Disable the capability of a group from getting mentioned

lfs_enabled.description: Enable/disable Large File Storage (LFS) for the projects in this group.

request_access_enabled.description: Allow users to request member access.

parent_id.description: The parent group ID for creating nested group.

default_branch_protection.description: See Options for default_branch_protection. Default to the global level default branch protection setting.

shared_runners_minutes_limit.description: Pipeline minutes quota for this group (included in plan). Can be nil (default; inherit system default), 0 (unlimited) or > 0

extra_shared_runners_minutes_limit.description: Extra pipeline minutes quota for this group (purchased in addition to the minutes included in the plan).

shared_runners_setting.description: See Options for shared_runners_setting. Enable or disable shared runners for a group’s subgroups and projects.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the group owned by the authenticated user.

parameters.name: with_custom_attributes
parameters.description: Include custom attributes in response (admins only).

parameters.name: with_projects
parameters.description: Include details from projects that belong to the specified group (defaults to true). (Deprecated, scheduled for removal in API v5. To get the details of all projects within a group, use the list a group’s projects endpoint.)

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the group.

membership_lock.description: Prevent adding new members to project membership within this group.

share_with_group_lock.description: Prevent sharing a project with another group within this group.

visibility.description: The visibility level of the group. Can be private, internal, or public.

require_two_factor_authentication.description: Require all users in this group to setup Two-factor authentication.

two_factor_grace_period.description: Time before Two-factor authentication is enforced (in hours).

project_creation_level.description: Determine if developers can create projects in the group. Can be noone (No one), maintainer (Maintainers), or developer (Developers + Maintainers).

auto_devops_enabled.description: Default to Auto DevOps pipeline for all projects within this group.

subgroup_creation_level.description: Allowed to create subgroups. Can be owner (Owners), or maintainer (Maintainers).

avatar.description: Image file for avatar of the group. Introduced in GitLab 12.9

mentions_disabled.description: Disable the capability of a group from getting mentioned

lfs_enabled (optional).description: Enable/disable Large File Storage (LFS) for the projects in this group.

request_access_enabled.description: Allow users to request member access.

file_template_project_id.description: The ID of a project to load custom file templates from.

shared_runners_minutes_limit.description: Pipeline minutes quota for this group (included in plan). Can be nil (default; inherit system default), 0 (unlimited) or > 0

extra_shared_runners_minutes_limit.description: Extra pipeline minutes quota for this group (purchased in addition to the minutes included in the plan).

prevent_forking_outside_group.description: When enabled, users can not fork projects from this group to external namespaces

parameters.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the group

get.summary: Gets a badge of a group.
get.description: This feature was introduced in GitLab 10.6.

parameters.name: badge_id
parameters.description: The badge ID

200.description: Gets a badge of a group.

put.summary: Updates a badge of a group.
put.description: This feature was introduced in GitLab 10.6.

parameters.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the group owned by the authenticated user.

200.description: Updates a badge of a group.

delete.summary: Removes a badge from the group.

parameters.name: badge_id
parameters.description: The badge ID

204.description: Removes a badge from the group.

get.summary: Gets a list of group badges viewable by the authenticated user.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Current page number

parameters.name: name

200.description: Gets a list of group badges viewable by the authenticated user.

post.summary: Adds a badge to a group.

parameters.description: URL of the badge image

200.description: Preview a badge from a group.

footer_message.description: Message within the system footer bar

ci_project_subscriptions.description: Maximum number of pipeline subscriptions to and from a project

ci_needs_size_limit.description: Maximum number of needs dependencies that a job can have

ci_registered_group_runners.description: Maximum number of runners registered per group

ci_registered_project_runners.description: Maximum number of runners registered per project

conan_max_file_size.description: Maximum Conan package file size in bytes

enforcement_limit.description: Maximum storage size for the root namespace enforcement in MiB

generic_packages_max_file_size.description: Maximum generic package file size in bytes

helm_max_file_size.description: Maximum Helm chart file size in bytes

maven_max_file_size.description: Maximum Maven package file size in bytes

notification_limit.description: Maximum storage size for the root namespace notifications in MiB

npm_max_file_size.description: Maximum NPM package file size in bytes

nuget_max_file_size.description: Maximum NuGet package file size in bytes

pypi_max_file_size.description: Maximum PyPI package file size in bytes

terraform_module_max_file_size.description: Maximum Terraform Module package file size in bytes

storage_size_limit.description: Maximum storage size for the root namespace in MiB

pipeline_hierarchy_size.description: Maximum number of downstream pipelines in a pipeline's hierarchy tree

get.summary: Get a single job by ID

parameters.name: job_id
parameters.description: The ID of the job

parameters.name: job_id
parameters.description: The ID of the manual job to run

parameters.name: job_variables_attributes
parameters.description: An array containing the custom variables available to the job

ProjectIdOrPath.name: id
ProjectIdOrPath.description: The ID or [URL-encoded path of the project](https://docs.gitlab.com/api/rest/#namespaced-paths).

status.description: The current status of the job

stage.description: The stage of the job in the CI/CD pipeline

created_at.description: The creation time of the job

started_at.description: The start time of the job

finished_at.description: The finish time of the job

archived.description: Indicates if the job is archived

allow_failure.description: Indicates if the job is allowed to fail

erased_at.description: The time when the job was erased, if applicable

duration.description: The duration of the job in seconds

queued_duration.description: The duration the job was queued before execution, in seconds

artifacts.description: The artifacts produced by the job

tag.description: Indicates if the job is tagged

web_url.description: The URL for accessing the job in the web interface

ci_job_token_scope_enabled.description: Indicates if the CI/CD job token scope setting is enabled for the project

user.description: The user that started the job
